full_sentence: I think she understands that when sex bots become the norm the human species will be obsolete. I really hate the liberal freaks that coddle this garbage. The way things are going...the future looks to be a distinctly unpalatable one. I thank fuck I'm forty-seven and didn't have kids. The inner cities of Britain have become incrementally worse in the last 20 years. Years ago, you never saw any drugs on the street. If you did, it would be a one off. Now it's ubiquitous, sadly. What's Sydney like for druggies? Does it have a blend of different narcotics like London?
